Package Controllers

Class ParticipantController

java.lang.Object
Controllers.ParticipantController
public class ParticipantController extends Object
Controls interactions related to participants in a project.

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the Person with the given role if found; otherwise null.

      Returns:
      this ParticipantController instance's participants map.

    • hasParticipants

      public boolean hasParticipants()
      Checks if this ParticipantController instance has a participant map and has any mapped participants.
      Returns:
      true if the participant map exists or has any participants; false otherwise.

      Parameters:

      the role at index in the list of role types.

      IndexOutOfBoundsException - if index > the size of roleTypes.

    • assignPerson

      public void assignPerson(String role, Person person)
      Assigns a Person to a role in the currently selected project.
      Parameters:
      role - the role to which person should be assigned.
      person - the person to be assigned.

    • setParticipants

      public void setParticipants(ResultSet results) throws SQLException
      Gets the list of participants from results and stores it as a HashMap.
      Parameters:
      results - a set of results containing the details for all participants.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a Database communication occurs.

    • getMissingRoles

      public List<String> getMissingRoles()
      Finds all roles in roleTypes which are not in participants.
      Returns:
      roleTypes with the participants keys removed.

    • getSelectedParticipant

      public Person getSelectedParticipant()
      Returns:
      the Person mapped to the selectedRole key.

    • registerParticipant

      public Person registerParticipant(String role, int personId, int projectId) throws SQLException
      Inserts the given parameters into the 'participant' table in the database.
      Parameters:
      role - the person should be assigned to.
      personId - of the person to be assigned.
      projectId - of the project to which the personId should be assigned..
      Returns:
      the result of getPerson(personId)
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs

    • findPerson

      public Person findPerson(String phoneNumber) throws SQLException
      Finds the row in the 'person' table with the given 'phone_number' value.
      Parameters:
      phoneNumber - the phone_number of the person to find.
      Returns:
      a new Person object if a match is found for the phone_number.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs.

    • getPerson

      public Person getPerson(int personId) throws SQLException
      Finds the row in the 'person' table with the given 'person_id' value.
      Parameters:
      personId - the value of the 'person_id' column in the database.
      Returns:
      a new Person if the row is found, null if not.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs.

    • updateContactDetails

      public boolean updateContactDetails() throws SQLException
      Returns:
      true if the update was successful, false if the update failed.
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database error occurs.
